features: ✅【Hot-swappable Quiet Linear Switch】 High-quality PCB supports 3/5-pin hot-swappable, so you can enjoy the fun of making your own unique pc gaming keyboard without soldering. The linear fast silver switch Of improves the accuracy and initial pressure of the switch, effectively prevents false touches, triggers faster, and has strong stability. It is an ideal switch for long-term gaming keyboard use and gamers.

✅【Amazing RGB Backlight Effects】18 different RGB Lighting modes, lighting brightness, and effect speed are also highly adjustable. Mechanical gaming keyboard with precision-engineered keycaps offering crystal clear uniform backlighting
✅【75% Custom Quiet Mechanical Keyboard】The 75% percent keyboard added poron foam utilization, and a thick silicone damping bottom pad which all provide a responsive and peaceful typing sound.

✅【Linear TNT Pink Switch】This hot swappable mechanical keyboard has the same force at both the beginning and end of each stroke, as silent as red switch, but more tight feeling, that you can enjoy more accurate, cleaner, smoother touch. Clean sound brings you more comfort like the sprinkle. The ideal one to fit home, shared workspace and light gaming.
✅【With Multifunction Knob Ergonomic Keyboard】Adjust the brightness or sound of the light on the side of the keyboard，easily with a knob for fast, seamless and easy-to-use operation.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 75% Layout 82 Keys The GTSP 75 percent Mechanical Gaming Keyboard is designed for gamers who demand high performance and reliability. This keyboard features a compact design with 82 keys and knob, making it easy to carry and use anywhere. Quiet Button Sound B400 82-keys keyboard uses a thick silicone damping bottom pad material between the plate and keyboard housing on both top. This gives the keyboared a soft keypress feel, which is really comforting and soft to type on. RGB Backlight & Side Light Strips This gaming keyboard also features adjustable RGB backlighting with multiple lighting modes. Additionally, The brightness and color of the side light strip can be adjusted through the knob.

Compatible with 3Pin/5Pin Switch Hot-Swappable Equipped with hot swappable terminals, you could install the MX switches directly without soldering, easily build up your own mechanical keyboard. Support NKRO. Supports both 3 pin or 5 pin switches, such as Cherry, Otemu, Gateron, Kailh and other MX switches and its clones.

3 Indicator Lights & Knob Control Allows you to easily judge capitalization, win/mac mode, and scroll lock status. Two-stage Adjustable Tilt Legs Anti-slip and two-stage adjustable tilt outriggers, available in two different heights according to different needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars one of the better keyboards I have used
reviews.reviewText: I acquired this keyboard to replace my Logitech pop keys I had beforehand. coming from a Logitech keyboard to this has been an experience considering keycaps were harder to search for considering Logitech at its own standard when it came to certain keys. this is one of the cheaper hot swappable boards I've seen and so far it sounds and feels amazing. I have put a few different key caps sets on it but the default ones have had the best feeling and sound in my opinion. overall if you're looking for a really good mechanical keyboard on the cheap I would recommend this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars personal and location info vulnerable
reviews.reviewText: Certain keys were tied to "hidden" functions. The numbers keys do not work after these "hidden function keys" are pressed. Typing anything with a specific letter, which is part of our name, would instantly open an MSDOS looking window. Then the administrator request window. Then the computer information (ip, etc) window. Regardless of how many times we reset to factory settings. I believe it is the factory settings that programmed the keyboard to access OUR information. I am not a conspiracy theorist or paranoid OLD person. Tech is part of my professional and private life. This is highly scary! This keyboard was intended for my little girl (daughter). Thank goodness I had not connected her PC to the rest of the network or attached her other peripherals. Buyer BEWARE! Dangerous and highly suspicious!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not bad, just would like software
reviews.reviewText: They keyboard is well built and everything feels good, I just wish it had software for the lighting and honestly I might return it purely for it not having said software

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the Skyloong GK84 but for less money
reviews.reviewText: Looks like GTSP, aka Guffercty kred is selling the Skyloong GK84 75% board with all the features. I'm not sure what is missing, but I was not able to find the Skyloong 75% board on Amazon other than this one. It is wireless; it has the skyloong gasket, optical reds, shine-through keycaps, etc. It comes with a replacement spacebar, so you don't have to use the red one in the picture & replacement Esc key, so you don't have to use the proprietary "stepped" Esc key by Skyloong. It is hot-swappable. So the board normally sells for more on the official website. The software is hard to understand, but you'll have to look on YouTube for GK61 owners to show you how they configured the software. All the keys are remappable. You have 3-layers to program, but those won't have RGB, you have RGB on the "Driver" layer, so that is a little confusing. Basically, use the "Driver" layer and then reprogram the other layers with other remapped keys. The board does not come with a keyboard cover, it is wrapped in plastic in a cardboard box. Comes with a generic key and switch puller, a nice braided 6ft cord with a velcro tie attached. I don't know when it was manufactured, but probably in 2021 because the S/N ends in 21. I wish it came with a plastic dust cover like the Skyloong boards do when they come direct from the factory, but it's okay. GTSP seems like a great company, and I hope they continue to provide these boards! Thank you GTSP!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute keyboard, trash software
reviews.reviewText: Title says it all. If you want a cute keyboard and don't care about software, then this one is nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The keyboard so cute. I love the sounds easy to install. Keys are easy to change.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT RECOMMEND FOR CONSOLE
reviews.reviewText: if you are looking for a keyboard to plug in to a console, DO NOT BUY THIS KEYBOARD. I bought this keyboard for my ps5 to play games on it and it did not work. But then i plugged it in to my pc and it worked just fine. So if you are looking for a keyboard for your pc this is a decent keyboard, but if you want to use it for a console DO NOT BUY IT! Because it will not work!!

reviews.reviewTitle: sounds absolutely amazing and looks did not fall behind either
reviews.reviewText: This mechanical 75% keyboard is an auditory delight! The sound it produces is music to my ears—a satisfying, clicky symphony with every keystroke. The build quality is exceptional, offering both durability and a premium feel. Typing on it is an absolute joy, making work or gaming sessions even more enjoyable. The compact size of the 75% layout is a fantastic space-saver without compromising functionality. If you're in search of a keyboard that not only performs flawlessly but also sounds incredibly satisfying, you found it.
